name: Spiral Stairs Official Website
description: Official Website for Spiral Stairs, member of legendary indie rock band Pavement! Built using React.js

name: Make A Sandwich
description: Sandwich creation app built with React.js and React Bootstrap, using useState and useEffect hooks

name: Woodworth's Woodworks
description: Sample company page using vanilla HTML, CSS, and JS (ok, with a pinch of Bootstrap)

name: Fight Opera
description: Demo website for an Austin-based pro wrestling promotion, built using React.js and Bootstrap

name: My Portfolio
description: You're looking at it! Built using React.js

name: Sheltr
description: A mobile first swiping app for finding your next rescue pet! Built using React.js and MUI. Heroku changed so it's no longer hosted but live demo on my local machine available on request!

name: Password Generator
description: Select which character types to include and the length of your password, and this application will generate a random password. Use the Copy button to automatically copy the password to your clipboard!

name: README Generator
description: Hey developers! Sick of writing README files in Markdown? Use this tool to generate README files by answering simple prompts for any repository you have! The application runs in the terminal and can be easily customized using Javascript  and Inquier.js to create your own unique template!
